1.title: Sort Algorithm Visualization
1.description:
SortAlgorithm is a web-based application designed to provide real-time visualizations of popular sorting algorithms such as Merge Sort and Quick Sort.

These visualizations make it easier to understand, explore, and learn complex algorithms interactively.

SortAlgorithm offers an engaging and interactive way to visualize how sorting algorithms work step-by-step. It's especially useful for students, developers, and anyone learning algorithms.

subPoints.title: Outcome
subPoints.des:
• ✅ Users can visualize how sorting algorithms work in real-time.
  • ✅ Users can learn about the time complexity of each algorithm.
  • ✅ A hands-on approach to deepen understanding of sorting techniques.

subPoints.title: Technologies Used
subPoints.des:
• 💻 HTML: To structure the content and layout.
  • 🎨 CSS: To style the application and make it visually appealing.
  • ⚙️ JavaScript: To implement dynamic sorting animations and interactions.

3.title: Optimized To-Do List
3.description:
Optimized To-Do List is a lightweight task management application built using NeutralinoJS, offering an efficient alternative to traditional Electron-based apps.

With a minimal footprint of just 16MB, it provides essential features like adding, deleting, and marking tasks as done, ensuring a simple yet productive user experience.

Designed for speed and efficiency, this To-Do List reflects our ability to create optimized and performance-driven applications while maintaining a clean and intuitive UI.

subPoints.title: Technologies Used
subPoints.des:
• 💻 NeutralinoJS: A lightweight alternative to Electron for building cross-platform desktop apps.
  • 🎨 HTML and CSS: To structure and style the application.
  • ⚙️ JavaScript: To implement dynamic interactions and task management features.

4.title: Mini Projects
4.description: This section showcases two interactive mini-projects: the Simon Game and Tic-Tac-Toe. These projects focus on logic, UI/UX, and JavaScript-driven interactivity.

subPoints.title: Simon Game
subPoints.des:
A memory-based game where players must repeat an increasing sequence of lights and sounds.
Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to enhance user interaction and logic-building.

subPoints.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
subPoints.des:
A classic two-player game simple yet.
Developed with JavaScript, featuring a responsive UI and intelligent game logic.

2.title: AI-Powered Blog-App - MindScript
2.description:
MindScript is an intelligent blog creation platform built using the MERN stack and integrated with Google Gemini API to generate high-quality, AI-generated blog content.

Designed with seamless user experience in mind, users can easily log in and create engaging blog posts with just a few prompts—automating the content generation process while maintaining creative control.

This project demonstrates our ability to integrate AI capabilities within full-stack applications, making content creation smarter, faster, and more efficient.

subPoints.title: Key Features
subPoints.des:
• 📝 CRUD Functionality: Fully functional Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on blogs and their comments.
  • 🧠 AI Text Generation: Generate engaging blog content through prompt-based input using Google Gemini API.
  • 👤User Authentication: Admin-protected access for content management and moderation.

subPoints.title: Technologies Used
subPoints.des:
• ⚛️ React.js: For building a responsive and dynamic frontend.
  • 🌐 Node.js & Express.js: To handle the backend server and API routes.
  • 🗃️ MongoDB: For efficient blog data storage and retrieval.
  • 🧠 Google Gemini API: To power the AI blog content generation feature.
  • 🔐 JWT Authentication: Secure login with predefined credentials (admin@mindscript.com).
